title: password issues
content: The Messaging Co says that after changing my password with them I need to "make sure you update your password in any email application you are using". does that mean in Thunderbird? I can't remember any Thunderbird password, only Firefox. And I can't access anywhere where I can change it without having the original. Any ideas please. And does it mean that the password has to be the same for both Messaging Co and Thunderbird. Thanks
creator: meowngame

title: email not sending after adding more storage
content: I can't stop thunderbird from downloading my IMAP emails every time I start my computer. The emails moved out of archives and I do not know why, then I ran out of storage space, added storage and now Thunderbird want to upload (again)--(it is over six years of emails)
creator: walkingpearl2

title: thunderbird download page for windows 7 shows 404 page error
content: I use google search engine. Google is blocking my email account and wants personal identifying info to unblock. One solution recommended is to have my mail data transferred elsewhere. I want to use Thunderbird for my mail. On Thunderbird's download page for Windows 7, an error 404 comes up. Where is the download page? Thanks.
creator: frrancesca04
